metadata.name: Browser Started with Remote Debugging
metadata.comment: Detects browsers starting with the remote debugging flags. Which is a technique often used to perform browser injection attacks

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --remote-debugging-')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\firefox.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -start-debugger-server'))))

output.summary: Detects browsers starting with the remote debugging flags. Which is a technique often used to perform browser injection attacks
